name: Insidious Healing
text: Your healing spells give you an advantage when you choose to affect those targets with other spells.
benefit: Any creature that chooses not to attempt a saving throw against any healing spell you cast takes a –4 penalty on saving throws against other targeted spells you cast for 24 hours.
text_zh: 你在对接受过你治疗法术的生物施展其他法术时获得优势。
benefit_zh: 任何在接受过你任何治疗法术并且不选择豁免对抗的生物，会在接下来的24小时内在对你的其他目标型法术进行豁免时承受-4的惩罚。
